column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Lin says : " My metalbenders are on their way to Amon , and it 's all my fault .
#Text=You ca n't give up like this !
#Text=" Lin says : " I 'm not giving up .
#Text=I 'm gon na find my officers and take Amon down .
#Text=But I 'm gon na do it my way , outside the law .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sorry I did n't believe you .
#Text=But Asami 's dad being an Equalist is not an easy thing to believe .
#Text=Even now .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know .
#Text=I 'm sorry this whole thing happened .
#Text=" Mako says : " So ... does your offer to live in the Air Temple still stand ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Of course it does .
#Text=And Asami 's welcome , too .
#Text=" Mako says : " Thank you so much .
#Text=" Korra says : " After everything she 's been through , she 's going to need you , Mako .

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Lin Beifong Mako Tenzin Antagonists Equalists Hiroshi Sato Lieutenant says : " Minor Butler Lau Gan - Lan Metalbender officer Naga Pabu Saikhan Song Tahno Tarrlok Warehouse worker " Shiro Shinobi says : " Bolin 's a hero .
#Text=The mover 's star stopped Varrick 's kidnapping attempt on President Raiko , proving his brother 's innocence .
#Text=Mako and Korra were reunited , but Korra has no memory of their break - up .
#Text=Meanwhile , Jinora 's spirit is still trapped in the Spirit World , and Tonraq and his southern forces have been defeated .
#Text=Now it 's up to Team Avatar to stop Unalaq before Harmonic Convergence .
#Text=" Mako says : " What 's up with the coat ?
#Text=And where did you get that pie ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " It 's a Varrick ship , you never know what you 're gon na find .
#Text=There 's a whole level filled with fun - house mirrors .
#Text=Of course , there 's also the catgator deck .
#Text=I miss that guy , he really knew how to make a long trip interesting .
#Text=So , have you told Korra yet about how you guys broke up , and you kinda started dating Asami while she was off getting attacked by dark spirits ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Will you keep it down ?
#Text=I 'm waiting for the right moment .

#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh Mako , you know a wise man once told me that delivering bad news to a girlfriend was like ripping off a blood - sucking leech : you just have to do it fast and get it over with .
#Text=" Mako says : " I hate it when you listen to me .
#Text=Fine !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Unalaq will be waiting for you .
#Text=You 'll need all of your Avatar power to stop him .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm going to close the spirit portals , lock Vaatu in for another ten thousand years , and make Unalaq wish he 'd never been born .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thanks Mako .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh ... Um ... " Korra says : " Did you want something ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh no , no , nothing .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " As soon as we reach the Southern Water Tribe , we 'll blast through the blockade at the main portal .
#Text=Then we can rendezvous with Tonraq and his troops , crash through the defenses around the portal , and enter the Spirit World .
#Text=" Kya says : " Woah !
#Text=Since when does my little brother wan na crash or blast through anything ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'll do whatever it takes to save my daughter .
#Text=" Bumi says : " We all want to save Jinora , but I think your plan might be a tad over-aggressive , seeing as there are only seven of us and one ship .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Really ?
#Text=And what do you suggest ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " An attack like this calls for strategy .
#Text=I remember when I was surrounded by pirates at the Hurricane Straits .
#Text=We managed to capture them all , with just a feather , two eggs and a barrel of molasses .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I do n't want to hear any of your crazy stories now !
#Text=This is serious !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Are we almost there ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Almost , but ... I just picked up a distress signal from the southern troops .
#Text=There 's a problem .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mom !
#Text=" Senna says : " I 'm so happy you 're here .
#Text=" Korra says : " Where 's Dad ?
#Text=" Senna says : " Unalaq wiped out the entire southern resistance , and captured your father .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll get him back .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Where is my mother ?
#Text=" Senna says : " She 's in the healing hut .
#Text=So many injured .
#Text="
